dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Back in 2023, Kazakhstan started offering HPV vaccines to 11-year-old girls.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Back in twenty twenty three, Kazakhstan started offering H P V vaccines to eleven-year-old girls.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Since September of last year, Kazakhstan has begun voluntary HPV vaccinations for 11-year-old girls to help prevent cervical cancer.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and now the minister, Akmaral Alnazarova, is saying they might expand eligibility—maybe even to 18-year-olds.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and now the minister, Akmaral Alnazarova, is saying they might expand eligibility-maybe even to eighteen-year-olds.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The list of people eligible for vaccination against the human papillomavirus (HPV) may be expanded in Kazakhstan, according to Minister of Healthcare Akmaral Alnazarova. Speaking on the sidelines of the Mazhilis, the Healthcare Minister was asked whether 18-year-old Kazakhstani girls might be allowed to receive the HPV vaccine in the future.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and not just girls—they're considering boys too, which is uh, pretty significant.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and not just girls-they're considering boys too, which is uh, pretty significant.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "Questions are being raised " by both deputies and the public " about vaccinating not only girls but also boys.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm, she mentioned international standards allow vaccination as early as age nine, so expanding upward makes sense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhm, she mentioned international standards allow vaccination as early as age nine, so expanding upward makes sense.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: International experience shows that vaccinations can begin from age 9.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And they're even looking at a paid option for adults who want it, which is interesting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're even looking at a paid option for adults who want it, which is interesting.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The minister added that the option of offering HPV vaccination on a paid basis to anyone who wants it is also under review.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's probably because the national budget currently only covers that specific group—11-year-old girls.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's probably because the national budget currently only covers that specific groupminus eleven-year-old girls.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The national budget allocated funds last and this year for a specific group " 11-year-old girls.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Anything beyond that would need extra funding or planning, she said.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Anything beyond that would need extra funding or planning, she said.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Anything beyond that, regardless of gender, requires either additional funding or further planning.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's a big deal when you consider how common HPV is—over 100 types, some of which can lead to cancer.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a big deal when you consider how common H P V is-over one hundred types, some of which can lead to cancer.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: There are over 100 types of HPV, many of which are harmless and clear up on their own. However, some high-risk types can eventually lead to cervical cancer, as well as cancers of the anus, throat, and genitals.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Cervical cancer's the second most common cancer for women in Kazakhstan, with like 1,900 new cases a year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Cervical cancer's the second most common cancer for women in Kazakhstan, with like nineteen hundred new cases a year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the Ministry of Healthcare, cervical cancer is the second most common type of cancer among women of all ages in Kazakhstan, and the second leading cause of cancer-related death in women aged 25 to 44. Around 1,900 new cases are registered in the country each year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And it's the leading cause of cancer death for women aged 25 to 44 there, which is just… sobering.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's the leading cause of cancer death for women aged twenty five to forty four there, which is just... sobering.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the Ministry of Healthcare, cervical cancer is the second most common type of cancer among women of all ages in Kazakhstan, and the second leading cause of cancer-related death in women aged 25 to 44.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So expanding the vaccine could really make a difference long-term.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So expanding the vaccine could really make a difference long-term.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And the fact that it's voluntary, with parental consent through schools or local clinics, seems like a good approach.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And the fact that it's voluntary, with parental consent through schools or local clinics, seems like a good approach.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Since September of last year, Kazakhstan has begun voluntary HPV vaccinations for 11-year-old girls to help prevent cervical cancer. Vaccinations are administered in school medical offices after obtaining informed parental or legal guardian consent.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: I wonder if they'll move quickly on this—the minister sounded pretty positive about the proposals.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I wonder if they'll move quickly on this-the minister sounded pretty positive about the proposals.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, she called it logical and reasonable, so hopefully we see some action soon.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, she called it logical and reasonable, so hopefully we see some action soon.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I think this is very logical and reasonable," said Akmaral Alnazarova.
